page.title: 09STEVEN - LIVING WITHOUT CAR
page.content: I have lived in Takeley for five years. I live in a council house in North Road with my mum and dad and two sisters.We dont have a motor car and we are all used to walking.When we shop for groceries we go to Bishops Stortford which is four miles away on the bus.This costs Â£6.24 return and I think this is a lot of money.We sometimes shop in the village but cant always get everything we want.On Saturdays we often walk to Stortford especially to see our Nan.We go on holiday each year with Grandad and Grandma who take us in their car.I think having a car would help us to get to places quicker but it does not really bother me .I am used to walking and I have not got a bike because the roads around here are too dangerous especially the A120.
